message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $85 is a fair offer, I'm looking to get closer to $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $85. Would you be willing to meet me at $86?
